activities:
SECNAP Network Security provides both Managed Network Security services(MNSS) (managed IDS and IPS) and Managed Email Security (anti-spam) services to customers.

MNSS services will detect attacks against client networks and send notifications to client and/or optionally to the originating ISP.  Information sent to ISP does not include any personal information.

Email Security services (anti-spam) services are provided for companies and not for individuals.  Individual user information is provided by the company providing the information, however, users can still update or delete their information directly.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Dispute resolution will be provided by the American Arbitration Association (ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor program)
